body:
Comment 2: 
We have a root CA set for all but Snow Leopard.
I'm working on being able to ask Snow Leopard to check the chain for us.
Will send a CL for https.
For SMTP we can probably check against the advertised
host name from the greeting, so that at least the auth
mechanisms can be given a useful name.
I'm not sure what to do about self-signed things.
Maybe crypto/tls should have a public interface for
adding trusted certificates.
